com.taliter.fiscal.port.serial
Class SerialFiscalPortSource

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.taliter.fiscal.port.serial.SerialFiscalPortSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, FiscalPortSource, java.io.Serializable
public class SerialFiscalPortSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements FiscalPortSource, java.lang.Cloneable

A SerialFiscalPort factory.

Most of the parameters of this class are defined in the javax.comm package.

Defaults:

portName = null;
appName = "SerialFiscalPort";
openTimeout = 2000; // In milliseconds.
baudRate = 9600;
dataBits = SerialPort.DATABITS_8;
stopBits = SerialPort.STOPBITS_1;
parity = SerialPort.PARITY_NONE;
flowControl = SerialPort.FLOWCONTROL_NONE;

The set of available serial port names can be obtained via SerialFiscalPort.getPortNames().

See Also:
